articles.title: How is Zubimendi helping Arsenal's title push?
articles.summary: BBC football tactics correspondent Umir Irfan analyses how Martin Zubimendi is playing a key part in Arsenal's hunt for the Premier League title.

articles.title: 'The officials looked petrified' - was Villa Park chaos advert for VAR?
articles.summary: Newcastle United beat Aston Villa in the FA Cup fourth round in a match dominated by a number of controversial decisions without VAR.

articles.title: Kane reaches 500 goals - what other records could he break?
articles.summary: Bayern Munich striker Harry Kane became the first Englishman to reach 500 career goals on Saturday, but what other records could he break?

articles.title: Salah shines as Liverpool comfortably beat Brighton
articles.summary: Goals from Curtis Jones, Dominik Szoboszlai and Mohamed Salah give Liverpool a comfortable 3-0 win over Brighton in the fourth round of the FA Cup at Anfield.

articles.title: Brilliant Mansfield pile pressure on Parker - is his time up at Burnley?
articles.summary: Burnley manager Scott Parker is under increasing pressure as the Premier League side are dumped out of the FA Cup by League One Mansfield.

articles.title: Kane becomes first Englishman to 500 career goals
articles.summary: Bayern Munich striker Harry Kane strikes from distance against Werder Bremen to become the first Englishman in history to score 500 professional goals in official matches.

articles.title: Mansfield's Reed scores fabulous free-kick to upset Burnley
articles.summary: Watch Mansfield Town's Louis Reed produce "set-piece sorcery," scoring a sensational free kick to stun Premier League side Burnley and reach the FA Cup fifth round.

articles.title: 'What is he doing?' - Villa keeper Bizot shown red card
articles.summary: Aston Villa goalkeeper Marco Bizot is shown a straight red card for a "naughty challenge" on Newcastle United's Jacob Murphy in their FA Cup fourth round tie at Villa Park.

articles.title: What's the state of play in top-six scramble?
articles.summary: A four-way battle is shaping up for two places in the top half of the Scottish Premiership.

articles.title: Offside? Abraham scores controversial opener for Villa
articles.summary: A well-worked free-kick routine is finished off by Tammy Abraham for his first goal since returning to Aston Villa, but the replays show the goal would have been ruled out for offside had VAR been in ...

articles.title: Guehi scores as Man City beat spirited Salford
articles.summary: Marc Guehi scores his first goal for Manchester City to seal a 2-0 win for the Premier League side over League Two Salford City in the fourth round of the FA Cup.

articles.title: Ronaldo makes goalscoring return to Al-Nassr
articles.summary: Cristiano Ronaldo scores on his return to the Al-Nassr side after missing three games amid uncertainty over his future at the Saudi Arabian club.

articles.title: Ferguson 'giving Hearts pointers' on Scottish title fight
articles.summary: Hearts head coach Derek McInnes says he's in regular contact with Sir Alex Ferguson as the league leaders prepare to take on Rangers at Ibrox in a crunch match this weekend.

articles.title: A 'very special' FA Cup win and why managing Ronaldo is 'easy'
articles.summary: Portugal manager Roberto Martinez sits down with Kelly Somers to talk about his life in football.

articles.title: League One Mansfield fight back to stun Burnley
articles.summary: League One side Mansfield Town score two unanswered second-half goals to beat Premier League strugglers Burnley 2-1 at Turf Moor in the fourth round of the FA Cup.

highlights.title: Premier League highlights this week - Week Highlights

articles.title: New signing Toure scores again as Norwich beat West Brom
articles.summary: January signing Mohamed Toure scores his fourth goal in as many days for Norwich City, as the Canaries seal a 3-1 win over West Bromwich Albion in the FA Cup fourth round.

articles.title: Southampton beat Leicester to reach FA Cup fifth round
articles.summary: James Bree's header in the 109th minute of extra time gives Southampton a 2-1 win over fellow Championship side Leicester City in the fourth round of the FA Cup.

articles.title: Southampton and Norwich win all-Championship ties to progress in FA Cup
Wrexham beat Ipswich to progress to FA Cup fifth round
articles.summary: Wrexham book their place in the fifth round of the FA Cup for the first time in 29 years as they beat Championship rivals Ipswich Town at Stok Cae Ras.

highlights.title: Championship highlights this week - Week Highlights

articles.title: Elding scores first goal as Hibernian ease past St Mirren
articles.summary: Owen Elding marked his full Hibernian debut with a goal as David Gray’s side bounced back from their Edinburgh derby disappointment with a comfortable 2-0 victory over St Mirren.

highlights.title: League One highlights this week - Week Highlights

articles.title: Hull FC edge Bradford in thriller as Toulouse shock Wakefield
articles.summary: Hooker Cade Cust's late try sealed an opening Betfred Super League win for Hull FC as Bradford's first top-flight appearance in 12 years ended in a gutsy 27-20 defeat at the MKM Stadium.
